story:
Leadhills Silver Band is based in the small village of Leadhills in the Lowther Hills and is Scotland's highest silver band. The band reformed four years ago after a collection of silver instruments from the miners band which folded in the 1970s was found in the loft of the village hall. Although the old instruments which date back to the 1890s are beautifully inscribed that are not in the best condition and the band badly needs money to buy new instruments and uniforms.

Tory MP David Mundell recently offered Leadhills Silver Band a £100 donation. Band members decided that it would be inappropriate to accept money from candidate in the general election and have given this money to comic relief. However the band does need money to buy new instruments, music and uniforms. Please donate to this campaign to replace David Mundell's donation.

The target for this campaign is £500 which is more than the Mr Mundell donation, but this is the least which Indiegogo will allow, and the band does need money for instruments, uniforms and music as most of its members are children.

story:
About Cultiwate™

Cultiwate™ is an incubator for aspiring talents in the entertainment industry. It is a digital content curation ecosystem that will help short filmmakers, VR content creators and Ad makers with rich, diverse and quality content to get the right exposure and maximize revenue streams. Cultiwate's main goal is to help filmmakers transition to the big screen through mentorships, internships and incubation. 

Cultiwate™ is also the first exclusive curation and incubation hub for producing and distributing Short form Virtual Reality (VR) content -  Movies, Theme Park Rides, Games.

Our team is a perfect mix of key executives from Hollywood and Silicon Valley, Youth and Seniority, with multiple years of experience of having worked in major Film/ TV studios and at Fortune 500 companies.  Makuta Inc. is one of our integral partners in this exciting endeavor.   

Cultiwate™ has been selected as an emerging ‪#‎startup at this year's NAB Show and will be featured at the Startup Loft from April 11 to April 16, 2015. We will be announcing Cultiwate at this event.Come visit us at Booth ‪#‎N6839. For complimentary passes, Stay Tuned! 



Our Vision

Cultiwate’s vision is to become a one-stop shop for talented filmmakers using our powerful digital content curation ecosystem that will help filmmakers with rich, diverse and quality content to get the right exposure and maximize revenue streams. And, also help filmmaker's transition to the big screen through mentorships, internships and incubation.

Cultiwate will provide a reliable platform for all talents in the Film Business to showcase their skills that will pave way for providing them the much-needed break in the mainstream business thereby realizing our vision to be a powerful curation ecosystem.

Cultiwate will be the first ever curation cum incubation hub for Virtual Reality (VR) Content. We will be distributing VR content through our Cultiwate VR platform accessible via a plethora of VR headsets. We curate the best of the VR content submitted by filmmakers and monetize it on behalf of filmmakers. Apart from curating, Cultiwate will also develop and produce exclusive content in the VR space with the filmmakers from our network. 

While giving the filmmakers the well-deserved exposure, Cultiwate also helps them monetize their short films through multiple streams of distribution platforms ranging from our own in-house Cultiwate Ad-based Streaming, theatrical screenings, In-Flight and Cruise Entertainment to leading new media distributors like Amazon Instant, Hulu, Netflix and YouTube, thereby helping them recoup their existing investments. And, in this process, Cultiwate will charge a flat 30% distribution fee for facilitating and negotiating the deals.

Cultiwate will also provide affordable services for filmmakers ranging from Subtitling, Dubbing, Building Apps & Website, Drafting and Filing Copyright, Editing a unique trailer, Designing Titles and Poster for their short films in the platform, thus Cultiwate will be an exclusive 'Fiverr' for the Film Industry.  Later on we intend to bring in VFX services to the platform.

Cultiwate will provide a submission platform to various film festivals worldwide with a 1-click submission process from within the website at highly discounted prices or for free. We have struck deals with various film festivals (and in the process of adding more). The pricing (if discounted) on Cultiwate is exclusive and we do not charge filmmakers for online screeners hosting unlike competitors like Withoutabox (Amazon) and Film Freeway.

Cultiwate will also be the ‘IMDb of New Talents’ with a ‘New powerhouse of talents’ and will provide a comprehensive database for other filmmakers and producers to collaborate/ hire talents from our platform. It is a free service for filmmakers with a minimum of 1 approved upload in our platform and a paid service for ‘Others’ with a monthly/ annual subscription.

Cultiwate as an incubator works along with the audiences. The films curated by the curators are available for public voting (viewing & curating) and the audiences help us in narrowing the choice of top 12 films of the year based on top films of each month. 

In May 2015, Cultiwate will launch its platform for ‘Film makers’ and ‘Ad Makers’ and the Public Version after initial curation will launch in November 2015.

In short, Cultiwate’s grand vision is to become a leader in sourcing talent through 'quality content' and thus becoming a talent powerhouse. 




Features

 Curation

Cultiwate filters the Junk and gets your quality content after going through an extensive “multi-level” curation process by our specially designated curators.

 Exposure

At Cultiwate, Producers, Studio Executives, Critics, Actors, Technicians and Talent/ Literary agents curate your short films.

 Film Festivals

We have struck deals with various film festivals, including various Oscar qualifiers, all over the world to submit your films with a single click submission process, and at a discounted rate.

 Analytics

At Cultiwate, Transparency is at the helm of affairs and we have designed a perfect analytics platform which can be customized to the specific needs of the filmmaker. 

 Collaboration

Cultiwate is place where talents converge and nurture relationships for fruitful collaborations. We have made things easy for filmmakers to collaborate.

 Revenue 

At Cultiwate, we think that Revenues are rewards for the filmmaker’s hard work in the short run and we work on their behalf to earn maximum buck for their films. We have made deals with the best of the best online content distributors. 

 Mentorship

At Cultiwate, get mentored by industry veterans and we stride hard to put you to the best veteran in your field of specialty. Industry veterans will conduct master classes regularly.

 Incubation

Cultiwate is an incubator for Upcoming Talents in the Entertainment Industry. We spot the talents, develop and help finance their feature film/ TV projects.


How it Works (Film)




Products and Services

·  Film Incubator Platform

·  Ad Incubator Platform

·  Fiverr for Film Industry

·  IMDb for New Talents

·  Film Festival Submission Platform

·  Film/ Ad Streaming Platform

·  Distribution Platform

·  Advertising Platform

Film Incubator Platform is the first film incubator platform where the short filmmakers are nurtured, groomed and promoted by the industry veterans. Like Incubators accepts a Pitch/ Business Plan in the case of Startups, to enter our platform, Filmmakers upload short/ Ad films to our platform that are curated by critics, producers, agents and executives. Approved films are showcased to the public on Cultiwate’s Filmmaker’s Platform and the films that are passed on by the curators will be uploaded into Cultiwate’s YouTube Channel, where 5 films based on maximum likes each month will go directly to the Cultiwate platform where they will compete with other curated films in the platform.

The Top 10 Films of the month on ‘Cultiwate.com’ will be picked from ‘Public Votes’ based on Ratings. These filmmakers will also be given an opportunity to present a ‘feature film’ or a ‘TV Pilot’ screenplay of their respective short films – if we like the Screenplay; we will finance/ produce the content. We will also be promoting these screenplays (and the talents) through our Talent and Literary Agents and will be pitching in their screenplay to other producers/ studio executives in the industry.

The Top filmmaker of the month will also be given an opportunity to direct another short film fully financed and produced by Makuta Films. At the end of the year the 12 short filmmakers get together for a ‘Talent Campus’ like the famous ‘Berlin Talent Campus’ – a week long mentoring session with industry veterans, and at the end – The best 3 of the 12 short films will be awarded Medals and a potential chance to direct a feature film.

Film Incubator Submission Process:

  I.  Sign up as Cultiwators

  II.  Login

  III.  Upload Film

  IV.  Curation

  V.  Approved Films are available on Cultiwate

  VI.  Passed on Films on Official YouTube Channel.

Film Incubator Process:

v  Showcase on Cultiwate.com for Public Curation.

v  Monthly Top 10 films based on ratings. The ten filmmakers can submit the feature length scripts of the shorts.

v  Internal team evaluates the screenplays and sends it to Literary Agents.

v  Based on cumulative ratings, annual list of top 10 films at the end of the year are picked.

v  10 Filmmakers submit fresh short film scripts (that can be adapted to a feature).

v  Critics evaluate the scripts and choose 5 best scripts to finance and produce.

v  5 filmmakers direct the short film. Jury picks the winner.

v  Winner gets a chance to potential direct a feature film.

Ad Incubator Platform is the first incubator platform exclusively for ad films where the Ad filmmakers are nurtured, groomed and promoted by the industry veterans. Filmmakers upload Ad films to our platform that are curated by industry executives and veterans. Approved films are showcased to the public on Cultiwate’s Ads Platform and the films that are passed on by the curators will be uploaded into Cultiwate’s YouTube Channel, where 5 films based on maximum likes each month will go directly to the Cultiwate platform where they will compete with other curated films in the platform.

Cultiwate’s Business Development executives then pitch the Ad Specs to the brands or the brands can approach our executives for negotiating a deal on behalf of the filmmakers. The deal will be split between 70/30 between the filmmaker and Cultiwate. 

Ad Incubator Submission Process:

  I.  Sign up as Cultiwators

  II.  Login

  III.  Upload Ads

  IV.  Curation

  V.  Approved Ads are available on Cultiwate

  VI.  Passed on Ads on Official YouTube Channel.

Ad Incubator Process:

v  Showcase on Cultiwate.com for Public Curation.

v  Monthly Top 10 Ads are voted based on ratings.

v  Based on cumulative ratings, annual list of top 10 ads in different categories are picked at the end of the year.

v  Industry Veterans vote for the different categories

v  Awards.

Fiverr for Film Industry (Concierge Services) We provide services to filmmaker on the platform called as the ‘Add on’ services, which are available in the movie’s manage page.

·  Copyright

·  Marketing and Promotion services

·  Subtitle and Audio Options

·  Mobile Apps and Websites.

·  Visual Effects/ Post services at very affordable rates

IMDb for New Talents To enable collaboration within the network and outside the network, our database helps with this regard. People can view portfolio and resume of talents and hire them – Cast and Crew, from the website. It is free for filmmakers inside the network and for a paid monthly/ annual subscription for outside network to contact talents.

Film Festival Submission Platform Filmmakers using Cultiwate’s platform can submit their films to various film festivals at a highly discounted fee or for free. This is possible because of deals we have made with various film festivals. Currently we have 10 film festivals in our platform and we are in the process of adding other film festivals to our catalogue. Film festival can join the Festivals Ecosystem via Filmfestivals.Cultiwate.com.

Film/ Ad Streaming Platform is the platform for public to watch and vote the ‘curated’ short films they like. It’s a platform where people become not just viewers but also responsible critics and evaluate the film based on different crafts of filmmaking. It is from these votes, the Top 10 films are chosen – and our critics have no role in the decision making process here.

All the films are free to watch and are uniquely monetized by advertisements. The unique monetization is done by integration of all the available ad-platforms into our videos to make sure at that point of time, when there is no video on a particular ‘ad server’, it turns to the other active ones. Also, our research team has been working on automating ‘Ad Bidding’ – A new ecosystem where different ad platforms are compared at that point of time and whichever platform has the ‘highest cost per click or impression’ will automatically start playing – ensuring higher payouts. Filmmakers also get a full-fledged analytics of their videos.

Film/ Ads Streaming Watching Steps:

1.  Sign Up/ Login

2.  Watch Films/ Ads

3.  Vote at the end of every film/ ads

4.  Write review

Distribution Platform All curated films apart from Cultiwate.com are also distributed to various platforms for maximum exposure and maximizing the revenue potential. The curated short films will be available on Hulu, Amazon, Netflix, In-Flight, Cruise Entertainment and also special theatrical screenings in major theater chains across North America, UK, Australia, Singapore and India. We distribute the films to these platform for a 70/30 split, where the filmmaker without any upfront payment earns 70% revenue.

Admaker Revenue Model

v  Showcase on Cultiwate.com for Public Curation.

v  Brands approach Cultiwate for negotiating the Ad Deal. Cultiwate Executives negotiate the deal on behalf of filmmakers.

v  Brand signs the deal and pays Cultiwate.

v  Cultiwate will split revenue 70/30 with the filmmakers.

Advertising Platform Filmmakers can promote their films for wider reach inside the ecosystem. We offer services to promote the film in various parts of the website through ‘invisible ads’ through featuring in the following sections:

·  Featured section

·  Recently Added

·  Recommended section

More direct form of Advertising in the form of ‘Video Ads’. There will be no ‘Pop Up Ads’ or ‘Banner Ads’.

If the films need to be visible in the website, Visible ‘advertise’ might be a direct way to promote the films. Advertising in the form of ‘Teasers’ in the Video Ads inside films – available in cost per click/ impression.

Direct Brand Advertising: Even though most of the Ad revenues are going to be coming from 3rd Party Ad Platforms and Brand Sponsors, Some brands can directly advertise through Cultiwate’s Video Ads System on a cost per click/ impression – similar to Google AdWords or Facebook Ads Platform.


Project Roadmap


The Platform for Filmmakers and Ad makers are all set to launch in July 2015. The filmmakers/ ad makers can start uploading their content into the library after signing up. The Platform is free and will be available as a Website/ iOS and Android Apps. The functionalities available in the platform are ‘Manage Movies’, ‘Analytics’, ‘Messages’ and ‘Notifications’.

The Concierge services are integrated into the Filmmaker’s Platform and it will be available as a tab “Add On” on every movie’s page inside ‘Manage Movies’. The services at the time of launch include Subtitling, Audio Options, Website, Mobile Apps, Trailer Cuts, Poster and Title Designs. The filmmakers in the platform will be intimated via Notifications and Messages. This service is available from July 2015.

The Platform for Film Festivals with very similar functionalities to Curator’s version but this platform comes with a sign up button where film festivals can register themselves in our platform. All films – whether curated or not can submit films to the film festivals. At this time, the platform is only open for ‘Film Festival Registrations’ and will be launched in July 2015.

The Platform for Curators is all set to launch in August 2015. Curators in this platform curate the uploaded contents. This platform is available as a Website/ Enterprise App on iOS and Android. The functionalities available in the platform are ‘Manage Movies’, ‘Analytics’, ‘Messages’ and ‘Notifications’. Handpicked Curators so no sign up option.

After completing curation by critics and executives, Multiapplex/ Youtube Channel Platform will be available from November 2015 for the Public. It is free to watch with a Sign up/ Login. The Platform will be available on the Website/ ‘Cultiwate’ iOS and Android Apps.

Film Festival Submissions will be available for filmmakers from November 2015 as a Tab in the ‘Movie Details’ Page inside ‘Manage Movies’. The communication for the submissions will be notified via Notifications and Messages (Film Festival Tab).

The next course of action will be a vital feature for Cultiwate – Tip Platform and IMDb for New Talents will be launched in January 2016.

MultiApplex Platform will be available on Roku Box in September 2016. It will be available on Chromecast and Apple TV in December 2016. 



Similar Ecosystems in the Pipeline

  • Cultiwate for Musicians 
  • Cultiwate for Authors
  • Cultiwate - China Version, with core focus on curating 'Chinese' content in China and other Mandarin and Cantonese speaking areas. 

Tasks Completed 

  • Platform for Filmmakers and Ad makers for Web, iOS and Android

     
  • Platform for Curators for Web, iOS and Android
  • Multiapplex Streaming Platform for Web, iOS and Android
  • Platform for Film Festivals

Competitors

  • Viddsee (South East Asia Focus)
  • The Smalls (UK Focus)
  • Short of the Week (Off-shoot Curated Videos of Vimeo)


Why do we need the funds?

  • Legal costs for the initial launch
  • Paid up Social Media and Traditional marketing
  • Initial Streaming and website maintenence 


Marketing Strategy

  • Promoting the Platform at various film schools worldwide
  • Celebrity Endorsements: Using our advisory board members and Brand Ambassadors, we will be filming video bytes and sharing it virally.
  • Online Marketing: Cultiwate will be marketed through 3rd party advertising channels – Google AdWords, Twitter, Facebook Ads and Bing Ads.
  • Sponsored events at Local Pubs in major cities worldwide inviting Filmmakers
  • Talent/ Literary Agents: We know the best agents/ managers in Los Angeles and New York and will be promoting 'Cultiwate' to their clients. 
  • Press: Hiring an A-List Publicist in Los Angeles. We will be issuing press releases to leading dailies, magazines and websites.
story_txt:
About Cultiwate™
 

Cultiwate™ is an incubator for aspiring talents in the entertainment industry. It is a digital content curation ecosystem that will help short filmmakers, VR content creators and Ad makers with rich, diverse and quality content to get the right exposure and maximize revenue streams. Cultiwate's main goal is to help filmmakers transition to the big screen through mentorships, internships and incubation. 



Cultiwate™ is also the first exclusive curation and incubation hub for producing and distributing Short form Virtual Reality (VR) content -  Movies, Theme Park Rides, Games.


Our team is a perfect mix of key executives from Hollywood and Silicon Valley, Youth and Seniority, with multiple years of experience of having worked in major Film/ TV studios and at Fortune 500 companies.  Makuta Inc. is one of our integral partners in this exciting endeavor.   




Cultiwate™ has been selected as an emerging ‪#‎startup at this year's NAB Show and will be featured at the
Startup Loft from April 11 to April 16, 2015. We will be announcing Cultiwate
at this event.Come
visit us at Booth ‪#‎N6839. For complimentary passes, Stay Tuned! 




Our Vision
Cultiwate’s vision is to become a one-stop shop for talented
filmmakers using our powerful digital content curation ecosystem that will help
filmmakers with rich, diverse and quality content to get the right exposure and
maximize revenue streams. And, also help filmmaker's transition to the big
screen through mentorships, internships and incubation.
Cultiwate will provide
a reliable platform for all talents in the Film Business to showcase their skills
that will pave way for providing them the much-needed break in the mainstream
business thereby realizing our vision to be a powerful curation ecosystem.
Cultiwate will be the first ever curation cum incubation hub for Virtual Reality (VR) Content. We will be distributing VR content through our Cultiwate VR platform accessible via a plethora of VR headsets. We curate the best of the VR content submitted by filmmakers and monetize it on behalf of filmmakers. Apart from curating, Cultiwate will also develop and produce exclusive content in the VR space with the filmmakers from our network. 
While giving the filmmakers the well-deserved exposure, Cultiwate also helps them monetize their short
films through multiple streams of distribution platforms ranging from
our own in-house Cultiwate Ad-based Streaming, theatrical screenings, In-Flight
and Cruise Entertainment to leading new media distributors like Amazon Instant,
Hulu, Netflix and YouTube, thereby helping them recoup their existing
investments. And, in this process, Cultiwate will charge a flat 30%
distribution fee for facilitating and negotiating the deals. 
Cultiwate will also
provide affordable services for filmmakers ranging from Subtitling, Dubbing,
Building Apps & Website, Drafting and Filing Copyright, Editing a unique trailer, Designing Titles and Poster for
their short films in the platform, thus Cultiwate will be an exclusive 'Fiverr' for the Film Industry.  Later on we intend to bring in VFX
services to the platform. 
Cultiwate will provide
a submission platform to various film festivals worldwide
with a 1-click submission process from within the website at highly discounted
prices or for free. We have struck deals with various film festivals (and in
the process of adding more). The pricing (if discounted) on Cultiwate is exclusive and we do not charge filmmakers for online screeners hosting
unlike competitors like Withoutabox (Amazon) and Film Freeway.
Cultiwate will also be
the ‘IMDb of New Talents’ with a ‘New powerhouse of talents’ and will provide a
comprehensive database for other filmmakers and producers to collaborate/ hire talents from our platform. It is a free service for filmmakers with a
minimum of 1 approved upload in our platform and a paid service for ‘Others’
with a monthly/ annual subscription. 
Cultiwate as an
incubator works along with the audiences. The films curated by the curators are available for public voting (viewing & curating) and the audiences help us in narrowing the choice
of top 12 films of the year based on top films of each month. 
In May 2015,
Cultiwate will launch its platform for ‘Film makers’ and ‘Ad Makers’ and the Public Version after initial curation will launch in November 2015. 
In short, Cultiwate’s
grand vision is to become a leader in sourcing talent through 'quality content' and thus becoming a
talent powerhouse. 


 





Features


 Curation

Cultiwate filters the Junk and gets your quality content after going through an extensive “multi-level” curation process by our specially designated curators.

 Exposure

At Cultiwate, Producers, Studio Executives, Critics, Actors, Technicians and Talent/ Literary agents curate your short films.
 Film Festivals

We have struck deals with various film festivals, including various Oscar qualifiers, all over the world to submit your films with a single click submission process, and at a discounted rate.
 Analytics

At Cultiwate, Transparency is at the helm of affairs and we have designed a perfect analytics platform which can be customized to the specific needs of the filmmaker. 


 Collaboration

Cultiwate is place where talents converge and nurture relationships for fruitful collaborations. We have made things easy for filmmakers to collaborate.
 Revenue 


At Cultiwate, we think that Revenues are rewards for the filmmaker’s hard work in the short run and we work on their behalf to earn maximum buck for their films. We have made deals with the best of the best online content distributors. 




 Mentorship

At Cultiwate, get mentored by industry veterans and we stride hard to put you to the best veteran in your field of specialty. Industry veterans will conduct master classes regularly.
 Incubation

Cultiwate is an incubator for Upcoming Talents in the Entertainment Industry. We spot the talents, develop and help finance their feature film/ TV projects.

How it Works (Film)





Products and Services
·  Film Incubator Platform

·  Ad Incubator Platform
·  Fiverr for Film Industry
·  IMDb for New Talents
·  Film Festival Submission Platform
·  Film/ Ad Streaming Platform
·  Distribution Platform
·  Advertising Platform

Film Incubator
Platform is the first film incubator platform
where the short filmmakers are nurtured, groomed and promoted by the industry
veterans. Like Incubators accepts a Pitch/ Business Plan in the case of
Startups, to enter our platform, Filmmakers upload short/ Ad films to our platform that are curated by critics,
producers, agents and executives. Approved films are showcased to the public on
Cultiwate’s Filmmaker’s Platform and the films that are passed on by the
curators will be uploaded into Cultiwate’s YouTube Channel, where 5 films based
on maximum likes each month will go directly to the Cultiwate platform where
they will compete with other curated films in the platform.

The Top 10 Films of the month on ‘Cultiwate.com’ will be picked from
‘Public Votes’ based on Ratings. These filmmakers will also be given an
opportunity to present a ‘feature film’ or a ‘TV Pilot’ screenplay of their
respective short films – if we like the Screenplay; we will finance/ produce
the content. We will also be promoting these screenplays (and the talents)
through our Talent and Literary Agents and will be pitching in their screenplay
to other producers/ studio executives in the industry. 

The Top filmmaker of the month will also be given an opportunity to
direct another short film fully financed and produced by Makuta Films. At the
end of the year the 12 short filmmakers get together for a ‘Talent Campus’ like
the famous ‘Berlin Talent Campus’ – a week long mentoring session with industry
veterans, and at the end – The best 3 of the 12 short films will be awarded
Medals and a potential chance to direct a feature film.

Film Incubator Submission Process:
 
I. 
Sign up
as Cultiwators
 
II. 
Login
 
III. 
Upload
Film
 
IV. 
Curation
 
V. 
Approved
Films are available on Cultiwate
 
VI. 
Passed on
Films on Official YouTube Channel.

Film Incubator
Process:
v  Showcase on Cultiwate.com for Public Curation.
v  Monthly Top 10 films based on ratings. The ten
filmmakers can submit the feature length scripts of the shorts.
v  Internal team evaluates the screenplays and
sends it to Literary Agents.
v  Based on cumulative ratings, annual list of top
10 films at the end of the year are picked.
v  10 Filmmakers submit fresh short film scripts
(that can be adapted to a feature).
v  Critics evaluate the scripts and choose 5 best
scripts to finance and produce. 
v  5 filmmakers direct the short film. Jury picks
the winner. 
v  Winner gets a chance to potential direct a
feature film.


Ad Incubator Platform is the first incubator platform exclusively for ad films where
the Ad filmmakers are nurtured, groomed and promoted by the industry veterans. Filmmakers upload Ad
films to our platform that are curated by industry executives and veterans. Approved
films are showcased to the public on Cultiwate’s Ads Platform and the films
that are passed on by the curators will be uploaded into Cultiwate’s YouTube
Channel, where 5 films based on maximum likes each month will go directly to
the Cultiwate platform where they will compete with other curated films in the
platform.

Cultiwate’s Business Development executives then pitch the Ad Specs to
the brands or the brands can approach our executives for negotiating a deal on
behalf of the filmmakers. The deal will be split between 70/30 between the
filmmaker and Cultiwate.  


Ad Incubator Submission Process:
 
I. 
Sign up
as Cultiwators
 
II. 
Login
 
III. 
Upload Ads
 
IV. 
Curation
 
V. 
Approved Ads
are available on Cultiwate
 
VI. 
Passed on
Ads on Official YouTube Channel.

Ad
Incubator Process:
v  Showcase on Cultiwate.com for Public Curation.
v  Monthly Top 10 Ads are voted based on ratings.

v  Based on cumulative ratings, annual list of top
10 ads in different categories are picked at the end of the year.
v  Industry Veterans vote for the different
categories
v  Awards.


Fiverr for Film Industry (Concierge Services) We provide services to filmmaker on the platform called as the ‘Add on’ services,
which are available in the movie’s manage page. 

· 
Copyright
·  Marketing and Promotion services
·  Subtitle
and Audio Options
· 
Mobile
Apps and Websites.
· 
Visual
Effects/ Post services at very affordable rates 

IMDb for New Talents To enable
collaboration within the network and outside the network, our database helps
with this regard. People can view portfolio and resume of talents and hire them
– Cast and Crew, from the website. It is free for filmmakers inside the network
and for a paid monthly/ annual subscription for outside network to contact talents.

Film Festival Submission Platform Filmmakers using Cultiwate’s platform can submit their films to various
film festivals at a highly discounted fee or for free. This is possible because
of deals we have made with various film festivals. Currently we have 10 film
festivals in our platform and we are in the process of adding other film festivals
to our catalogue. Film festival can join the Festivals Ecosystem via
Filmfestivals.Cultiwate.com.




Film/ Ad
Streaming Platform is the platform for public to watch and vote the ‘curated’ short films
they like. It’s a platform where people become not just viewers but also
responsible critics and evaluate the film based on different crafts of
filmmaking. It is from these votes, the Top 10 films are chosen – and our
critics have no role in the decision making process here. 

All the films are free to watch and are uniquely monetized by
advertisements. The unique monetization is done by integration of all the
available ad-platforms into our videos to make sure at that point of time, when
there is no video on a particular ‘ad server’, it turns to the other active
ones. Also, our research team has been working on automating ‘Ad Bidding’ – A
new ecosystem where different ad platforms are compared at that point of time
and whichever platform has the ‘highest cost per click or impression’ will
automatically start playing – ensuring higher payouts. Filmmakers also get a
full-fledged analytics of their videos.

Film/ Ads Streaming Watching Steps:
1. 
Sign Up/
Login
2. 
Watch
Films/ Ads
3. 
Vote at
the end of every film/ ads
4. 
Write
review 

Distribution Platform All
curated films apart from Cultiwate.com are also distributed to various
platforms for maximum exposure and maximizing the revenue potential. The
curated short films will be available on Hulu, Amazon, Netflix, In-Flight,
Cruise Entertainment and also special theatrical screenings in major theater chains across North America, UK, Australia, Singapore and India. We distribute the films to these
platform for a 70/30 split, where the filmmaker without any upfront payment
earns 70% revenue. 

Admaker
Revenue Model
v  Showcase on Cultiwate.com for Public Curation.
v  Brands approach Cultiwate for negotiating the
Ad Deal. Cultiwate Executives negotiate the deal on behalf of filmmakers.
v  Brand signs the deal and pays Cultiwate. 
v  Cultiwate will split revenue 70/30 with the
filmmakers.


Advertising Platform Filmmakers can promote their films for wider reach inside the
ecosystem. We offer services to
promote the film in various parts of the website through ‘invisible ads’
through featuring in the following sections:
· 
Featured section
· 
Recently Added
· 
Recommended
section
More direct form of Advertising in the form of ‘Video Ads’. There will
be no ‘Pop Up Ads’ or ‘Banner Ads’.
If the films need to be visible in the website, Visible
‘advertise’ might be a direct way to promote the films. Advertising in the form
of ‘Teasers’ in the Video Ads inside films – available in cost per click/
impression. 

Direct Brand Advertising: Even though most of the Ad revenues
are going to be coming from 3rd Party Ad Platforms and Brand
Sponsors, Some brands can directly advertise through Cultiwate’s Video Ads
System on a cost per click/ impression – similar to Google AdWords or Facebook
Ads Platform.




Project Roadmap

The Platform for Filmmakers and Ad
makers are all set to launch in July 2015. The filmmakers/
ad makers can start uploading their content into the library after signing up.
The Platform is free and will be available as a Website/ iOS and
Android Apps. The functionalities available in the platform are ‘Manage
Movies’, ‘Analytics’, ‘Messages’ and ‘Notifications’.
The Concierge services are integrated into the Filmmaker’s Platform and it will
be available as a tab “Add On” on every movie’s page inside ‘Manage Movies’.
The services at the time of launch include Subtitling, Audio Options, Website,
Mobile Apps, Trailer Cuts, Poster and Title Designs. The filmmakers in the
platform will be intimated via Notifications and Messages. This service is
available from July 2015.


The Platform
for Film Festivals with very similar functionalities to Curator’s
version but this platform comes with a sign up button where film festivals can
register themselves in our platform. All films – whether curated or not can
submit films to the film festivals. At this time, the platform is only open for
‘Film Festival Registrations’ and will be launched in July 2015.
The Platform for Curators is all set to launch in August 2015. Curators in this platform curate the uploaded contents. This platform is available as a Website/ Enterprise App on iOS and Android. The functionalities available in the platform are ‘Manage Movies’, ‘Analytics’, ‘Messages’ and ‘Notifications’. Handpicked Curators so no sign up option.


After
completing curation by critics and executives, Multiapplex/ Youtube
Channel Platform will be available from November 2015 for
the Public. It is free to watch with a Sign up/
Login. The Platform will be available on the Website/ ‘Cultiwate’ iOS
and Android Apps.
Film Festival Submissions will be available for filmmakers from November 2015 as a Tab in the ‘Movie Details’ Page inside ‘Manage Movies’. The communication for the submissions will be notified via Notifications and Messages (Film Festival Tab).


The
next course of action will be a vital feature for Cultiwate – Tip
Platform and IMDb for New Talents will be launched in January
2016.


MultiApplex Platform will be available on Roku Box in September
2016. It will be available on Chromecast and Apple
TV in December 2016. 











Similar Ecosystems in the Pipeline

Cultiwate for Musicians 

Cultiwate for Authors

Cultiwate - China Version, with core focus on curating 'Chinese' content in China and other Mandarin and Cantonese speaking areas. 


Tasks Completed 





Platform for Filmmakers and Ad makers for Web, iOS and Android

 


Platform for Curators for Web, iOS and Android


Multiapplex Streaming Platform for Web, iOS and Android


Platform for Film Festivals






Competitors


Viddsee (South East Asia Focus)
The Smalls (UK Focus)
Short of the Week (Off-shoot Curated Videos of Vimeo)


Why do we need the funds?


Legal
     costs for the initial launch
Paid
     up Social Media and Traditional marketing
Initial Streaming and website maintenence 



Marketing Strategy


Promoting
     the Platform at various film schools worldwide

Celebrity
     Endorsements: Using our advisory board members and Brand Ambassadors, we
     will be filming video bytes and sharing it virally.

Online
     Marketing: Cultiwate will be marketed through 3rd party
     advertising channels – Google AdWords, Twitter, Facebook Ads and Bing Ads.

Sponsored
     events at Local Pubs in major cities worldwide inviting Filmmakers

Talent/
     Literary Agents: We know the best agents/ managers in Los Angeles and
     New York and will be promoting 'Cultiwate' to their clients. 

Press:
     Hiring an A-List Publicist in Los Angeles. We will be issuing press
     releases to leading dailies, magazines and websites.

story:
Update!

Sajnos úgy alakult, hogy a Városi Paradicsom közösségi föld projekt idén tavasszal mégsem tud elindulni. 2016-ban szeretnénk elindítani az első szezont, addig pedig még találnunk kell egy szponzort. A közösségi föld halasztása miatt a közösségi piknikező kialakítása is egy évvel eltolódott. Az itt összegyűlt támogatásokat fel tudjuk használni a jövő évi kezdéskor, vagy aki igényli, annak visszautaljuk a hozzájárulását. Ezügyben mindenkinek írunk személyesen is!

Találkozunk 2016-ban a Városi Paradicsomban!


Sziasztok!

Régi álmunkat valósítjuk meg: májusban elindul Budapest első közösségi földje!

A helyszín a MÜPÁ-tól délre fekszik, közvetlenül a Soroksári-Duna partján. A földműveléshez a területet 40 m2-es parcellákra osztjuk, amelyeken 20 féle zöldséget termesztünk. Egy ekkora veteményes ellát egy 4 fős családot friss, vegyszermentes zöldséggel májustól októberig. A parcellák értékesítése már megkezdődött, erről több információért keresd fel honlapunkat!

Mire kérjük a támogatást?

A felszántott és megművelt terület mellé szeretnénk létrehozni egy közösségi piknikezőt. Ez egy olyan hiánypótló hely lenne Budapesten, ahol háborítatlanul lazulhatnál idillikus környezetben, közvetlenül a Duna partján! Azt szeretnénk, hogy itt mindent megtalálj, amire egy napsütéses tavaszi délután vagy éppen egy nyári estén a városban vágynál.
Lesz tűzrakó bográcsfelszereléssel és a szalonnasütés kellékeivel, korlátlan mennyiségű tűzifával. Lesz grillező hosszú, kényelmes pulttal, és minden eszközzel, amire a sütögetéshez szükséged lehet. Lesznek napozóágyak, babzsákok, függőágyak, napos és árnyékos pihenők. Tudsz majd itt tollasozni, röplabdázni, petanque-ozni, lengőtekézni. Kifekhetsz a Duna mellé napozni, vagy csak a fűbe olvasni. Hétvégenként szervezünk koncerteket, bulikat, közös főzéseket, rendszeresen lesz kertmozi és még sok minden más! Egyszóval ha a városban ragadsz a nyár közepén, akkor is lesz egy hely, ahol nyaralhatsz!

Támogass minket, hogy együtt tudjunk bográcsozni és röplabdázni a Duna-parton!



A közösségi finanszírozás

A kitűzött célunk 3 000 000 Ft (12000 USD) elérése. Ha összegyűlne ez az összeg, abból nagyon szuperre meg tudnánk csinálni a közösségi piknikezőt. A tereprendezés és az épített kültéri bútorok, játékok, sportpályák megvalósításán túl a területet védenünk, őriznünk kell, biztosítanunk kell nektek mosdót, rendszeres takarítást, biciklitárolót. Ha nem jön össze a teljes összeg, akkor is meg szeretnénk csinálni a helyet, csak sokkal szerényebb kivitelben. Az Indiegogo lehetővé teszi, hogy amennyiben levesebb pénz gyűlik össze, mint amit kitűztünk, akkor is meg tudjuk tartani az összeget, szóval tényleg minden támogatás számít!
Támogatásodért cserébe olyan dolgokat kínálunk, amikre a piknikezéshez vagy a saját zöldség termesztéséhez szükséged lehet, mindezt magas minőségben, egyedi grafikával, limitált darabszámban. Bármelyik csomagot választod, vagy bármekkora összeggel támogatod, hogy megvalósítsuk Budapest legszebb fekvésű Duna-parti közösségi helyét, hozzájárulásodat a közösségi térbe kihelyezett támogatói táblán köszönjük meg a neved feltüntetésével (persze csak ha beleegyezel). Fordíthatod a pénzedet a támogatáson keresztül jótékony célra is. Ezeket az opciókat a jobb oldalon látható csomagok részletezik! Az ajándékok kézbesítése május-júniusban történik, erről még értesítünk.
Ha nem tudsz anyagilag hozzájárulni, de szeretnél segíteni a Városi Paradicsom létrehozásában, akkor terjeszd a célunkat, hívd fel mások figyelmét arra, milyen szuper projekten dolgozunk! Nagyon hálásak lennénk, ha a barátaidnak is szólnál a terveinkről, vagy megosztanád ezt a kampányt.


Köszönjük!

Minden támogatást, biztatást, megosztást nagyon köszönünk! Ha bármilyen kérdésed van, kommentelj ide, vagy írj a Facebook-oldalunkra.

Találkozunk a Városi Paradicsomban!

Támogatásodért cserébe olyan dolgokat kínálunk, amikre a piknikezéshez vagy a saját zöldség termesztéséhez szükséged lehet, mindezt magas minőségben, egyedi grafikával, limitált darabszámban. Bármelyik csomagot választod, vagy bármekkora összeggel támogatod, hogy megvalósítsuk Budapest legszebb fekvésű Duna-parti közösségi helyét, hozzájárulásodat a közösségi térbe kihelyezett támogatói táblán köszönjük meg a neved feltüntetésével (persze csak ha beleegyezel). Fordíthatod a pénzedet a támogatáson keresztül jótékony célra is. Ezeket az opciókat a jobb oldalon látható csomagok részletezik! Az ajándékok kézbesítése május-júniusban történik, erről még értesítünk.
Ha nem tudsz anyagilag hozzájárulni, de szeretnél segíteni a Városi Paradicsom létrehozásában, akkor terjeszd a célunkat, hívd fel mások figyelmét arra, milyen szuper projekten dolgozunk! Nagyon hálásak lennénk, ha a barátaidnak is szólnál a terveinkről, vagy megosztanád ezt a kampányt.
Köszönjük!Minden támogatást, biztatást, megosztást nagyon köszönünk! Ha bármilyen kérdésed van, kommentelj ide, vagy írj a Facebook-oldalunkra.Találkozunk a Városi Paradicsomban!

story:
THE CONCEPT


The Kid Secure Home concept is an innovative and smart solution that ensures safety for children in the kitchen and peace of mind for parents.

« Children safety for a happy family  For a safer home »

  • One concept, two safety elements:
  • a stove protection to prevent from burns
  • a drawer safety system to ensure toxic products and dangerous objects are out of reach

« In France only, 2’000 children under 6 years old are victims of household accidents daily. It is roughly 740’000 ending up in the hospital emergency services yearly. And 1'700’000 up to 15 years old.
The household is the first place of risk for children under age 4, where over 80% of the accidents occurINVS, Epac 2002 – 2003. 

« Every child injury means two parents in worry »


THE KID SECURE HOME SOLUTION

The Kid Secure Home Solution: it is a fully integrated, secure and clean system that truly protects children against risks of accidents in the kitchen

Protection against multiple risks: burns, cuts, poisoning

  • Integrated: fits any original design
  • Clean: protects against dust, spills, …
  • Minimal cost, maximum protection 

FINANCING THE DRAWER SAFETY KIT

Drawer Safety Kit:  We chose to begin by producing drawer safety kits. They that can be produced independently. They can reach the market very soon and require significantly lesser industrial means than a full cabinet would. The advantage is that existing kitchens can be easily equipped to eliminate intoxication or cutting risk. All parents deserve to get rid of that type of worries. The sale of kits will provide the capital to finally produce the complete system with both protections.


WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

Why We Need Your Support: We need your support because the industrial production needs important financing to reach the highest quality standards. Also thousands of people believe that the Kid Secure Home solution is useful and can truly help reduce household risks for their children. That is why it has been awarded a gold medal at the Concours l’Epine (Paris, France) in 2010 and bronze medal at the International Exhibition of Inventions (Geneva, Switzerland) in 2011. The solution was so successful on the television show The Inventor of 2012 that it was shortlisted in the 9 best inventions eligible for the finals over a pool of 650 candidates.


PROTOTYPES

Prototypes: Currently we only have one fully working prototype for the complete solution and another one for the drawer kit. They are made in metal. The current photos and videos are all shot with these. Our vision is to bring our safety solutions at an affordable price to families without compromising with quality. Our task is to refine our concept the closest to the technical ideal for a final production in plastic and with the most universal form factor. We are doing our best to achieve that goal have developed ingenious concepts that we need to test.


PROJECT TIMELINE

  • May-June-July = Final design and plastic prototype tests (3D prints)
  • August-September = Production of industrial moulding sets
  • October-November = Assembly and packing
  • December = Shipping


HOW WILL THE FUNDS BE USED

How will the funds be used

  • 100’000 = Moulding and other manufacturing set-up
  • 25’000 = Final design and prototypes
  • 10’000 = Assembly and other manufacturing costs
  • 30’000 = Production and packaging of ready to ship modules
  • 5’000 = Incorporation and other costs

DEVELOPMENT TIME

Development time: A significant step to start mass production is the creation of an industrial moulding set. It allows producing the plastic kits by injection. We want a universal form factor and it will take up to six months to reach the industrial production stage. Perfection is time-consuming, but so worth it.


OUR SUPPORTERS

Tavelli (Metal Prototype)

http://www.its-informatique.ch/dossiers/tavelli/cms/menu.php

Fairymotion (Communication Agency)
http://www.fairymotion.com/

Edouard (Photo, Video)
http://www.ed-66.com/

Industries Baud (Ingéniérie Metal)
http://www.baud-industries.com/

Toby

http://unagisound.com/

Okinawa (3D)

http://www.okinawa.fr/

Didier Lorillot

http://www.lorillot.com/


Français:

LE CONCEPT


Le concept: La solution Kid Secure Home a pour but d’apporter la sécurité pour les enfants et la tranquillité pour les parents avec un système de sécurité dans la cuisine innovant et malin.

« La sécurité pour les enfants, la tranquillité pour les parents »

  • Nous avons un concept : un meuble intégrant deux éléments de sécurité :
  • la sécurité au niveau des plaques de cuisson pour éliminer les risques de brûlure
  • la protection des tiroirs pour éloigner les produits toxiques et les objets dangereux des enfants

« Chaque jour en France, 2 000 enfants de 0 à 6 ans sont victimes d’accidents de la vie courante. Sur une année, on estime à près de 740 000 le nombre d’accidents de la vie courante dans cette tranche d’âge (1 700 000 parmi les enfants de 0 à 15 ans) qui entraînent une consultation aux urgences hospitalières.
Pour les jeunes enfants entre 0 et 4 ans, l’intérieur de la maison (accident domestique) représente le principal lieu d’accident (plus de 80 %). »INVS, Epac 2002 – 2003. 

« Car un enfant accidenté c’est aussi deux parents mobilisés »


LA SOLUTION KID SECURE HOME

La solution Kid Secure Home: Kid Secure Home est un système de sécurité entièrement intégré, efficace et hygiénique qui protège l’enfant des risques d’accident ménager dans les cuisines.

  • Protection multirisques: brûlures, coupures, intoxications.
  • Intégré: respecte le design original
  • Hygiénique: anti-poussière, …
  • Coût minimal, protection maximale


FINANCER LE KIT TIROIR

Le kit de protection tiroir: Nous avons choisi de commencer par produire des kits de protection de tiroir. C’est un élément qui peut être produit indépendamment, rapidement et qui demande beaucoup moins d’infrastructure industrielle qu’un meuble complet. L’avantage c’est que les cuisines existantes pourront être facilement équipées pour éliminer les risques d’intoxication ou de coupure. C’est une préoccupation en moins que tous les parents méritent de connaître. La vente de ces kits nous permettra de constituer les capitaux pour enfin produire des meubles intégrant l’ensemble des protections. 


NOUS AVONS BESOIN DE VOUS

Pourquoi nous avons besoin de vous: Nous avons besoin de vous car l’industrialisation du système demande un financement important pour arriver à une qualité irréprochable. Des milliers de personnes sont convaincues de l’utilité de la solution Kid Secure Home et qu’elle peut contribuer significativement à la réduction des risques d’accidents domestiques. C’est pour cette raison qu’il a remporté une médaille d'or au Concours Lépine 2010, une médaille de bronze au Salon International de l’Invention à Genève en 2011. En 2012 le meuble intégrant les 2 éléments de sécurité a eu un tel succès dans l’émission l’Inventeur 2012 qu’il est parvenu parmi les 9 finalistes sur 650 candidatures.


PROTOTYPES

Les prototypes: Les prototypes existants sont aboutis et conçus en métal. Il y en a un pour le meuble complet et un pour le kit tiroir. Ils ont servi aux photos et vidéos et sont la réalisation fonctionnelle du concept. Notre vision est de proposer des solutions de sécurité abordables pour les familles sans toutefois faire de compromis sur la qualité. Notre tâche aujourd’hui est de raffiner ce concept pour une production en plastique de qualité et la plus universelle possible. Nous mettons donc tous nos efforts pour atteindre cet objectif et avons développé des concepts ingénieux qu’il nous faut maintenant tester.


LES ETAPES DU PROJET

Agenda

  • Février-mars-avril = Design final et test des prototypes en plastique  (impression 3D)
  • Mai-juin = Usinage industriel des moules d’injection plastique
  • Juillet-août = Assemblage et empaquetage
  • Septembre = distribution


UTILISATION DES FONDS

Allocation des fonds

  • 100’000 = Usinage des moules d’injection et coûts annexes
  • 25’000 = Design final et prototypes de test
  • 10’000 = Assemblage et autres coûts relatifs
  • 30’000 = Production et empaquetage près à l’envoi
  • 5’000 = Création de la société et autre coûts administratifs


PHASE DE DEVELOPPEMENT

Durée de développement: Une étape importante et incontournable pour la production industrielle est celle de l’usinage des moules d’injection plastique. Ces moules permettent de produire les kits en quantité. Nous peaufinons ainsi un concept universel c’est à dire adaptable à la majorité des tiroirs. Atteindre la perfection prend du temps mais cela en vaut la peine.


CEUX QUI NOUS SOUTIENNENT

Tavelli (Metal Prototype)
http://www.its-informatique.ch/dossiers/tavelli/cms/menu.php

Fairymotion (Communication Agency)
http://www.fairymotion.com/

Edouard (Photo, Video)
http://www.ed-66.com/

Industries Baud (Ingéniérie Metal)
http://www.baud-industries.com/

Toby

http://unagisound.com/

Okinawa (3D)

http://www.okinawa.fr/

Didier Lorillot

http://www.lorillot.com/



Deutch:

DAS KONZEPT


Das Konzept: Kid Secure Home ist ein cleveres und innovatives Sicherheitssystem für die Küche, dasKinder vor Alltagsunfällen schützt und den Eltern zu mehr Gelassenheit verhilft.

„Sicherheit für die Kinder, Gelassenheit für die Eltern“

Unser Konzept: Ein Möbelstück mit zwei integrierten Sicherheitselementen:

  • einem Herdplattenschutz, um Verbrennungen zu vermeiden
  • einem Sicherheitssystem für Schubladen, um giftige Substanzen und gefährliche Gegenstände von Kindern fernzuhalten

"Jeden Tag werden in Frankreich 2 000 Kinder zwischen 0 und 6 Jahren Opfer von Unfällen im Alltag. Umgerechnet auf ein Jahr, geht man von ungefähr 740 000 Alltagsunfällen in dieser Altersstufe aus (1 7000 000 bei Kindern zwischen 0 und 15 Jahren), die einen Besuch der Notaufnahme zur Folge haben. 
Kleinkinder zwischen 0 und 4 Jahren werden hauptsächlich in Ihrem eigenen Zuhause (mehr als 80 %) Opfer von Unfällen (Haushaltsunfälle).INVS, Epac 2002 – 2003.


DAS KID SECURE HOME SYSTEM

Das Kid Secure Home-System: Kid Secure Home ist ein effizientes, hygienisches und vollkommen integriertes Sicherheitssystem, das Ihr Kind vor Haushaltsunfällen in der Küche schützt.

  • Umfangreicher Schutz: Verbrennungen, Schnittverletzungen, Vergiftungen
  • Integriert: kann an jedes Design angepasst werden
  • Hygienisch: staubabweisend
  • Minimale Kosten, maximaler Schutz

FINANZIERUNG DES SCHUBLADEN-SICHERHEITSSYSTEMS

Das Schubladen-Sicherheitssystem: Wir haben beschlossen, als Erstes dasSicherheitssystem für Schubladen zu produzieren. Hierbei handelt es sich um ein Element, das unabhängig und mit geringem Zeitaufwand produziert werden kann und für dessen Herstellung viel weniger industrielle Infrastruktur nötig ist, als für ein komplettes Möbelstück. Der Vorteil ist, dass es sehr leicht in bereits bestehende Küchen eingebaut werden kann, um das Risiko von Vergiftungen und Schnittverletzungen auszuschalten. Für die Eltern bedeutet dies eine Sorge weniger. Mit dem Kapital aus dem Verkauf dieses Systems können wir schliesslich Möbelstücke produzieren, die alle Sicherheitselemente enthalten.


WIR BRAUCHEN IHRE UNTER-STUETZUNG

Warum wir Ihre Unterstützung brauchen:Wir brauchen Ihre Unterstützung, weil die industrielle Produktion des Systems sehr kostspielig ist, wenn wir den höchsten Qualitätsstandards gerecht werden wollen. Tausende von Menschen sind überzeugt, dass Kid Secure Home eine sinnvolle Lösung ist, mit der die Risiken von Haushaltsunfällen deutlich reduziert werden können. Deshalb gewannen wir mit dem System den Wettbewerb Concours Lépine 2010(Paris, Frankreich) sowie eine Medaille bei der Messe für Erfindungen Salon International de l’Invention (Genf, Schweiz). 2012 wurde das Möbelstück mit den 2 Sicherheitselementen mit grossem Erfolg in der Fernsehsendung L’Inventeur 2012 vorgestellt und aus 650 Beiträgen unter die 9 besten Erfindungen ins Finale gewählt.


PROTOTYPEN

Prototypen: Wir haben gegenwärtig einen Prototyp für daskomplette Möbelstück und einen für das Schubladen-System. Sie sind aus Metall gefertigt. Diese Prototypen dienten als Modelle für die Fotos und Videos, um die praktische Umsetzung des Systems zu veranschaulichen. Unser Ziel ist es, Familien erschwingliche Sicherheitslösungen anzubieten, ohne bei der Qualität Kompromisse eingehen zu müssen. Unsere gegenwärtige Aufgabe besteht darin, das Konzept zu verfeinern, um die Elemente schliesslich aus qualitativ hochwertigem Plastik und so universell wie möglich produzieren zu können. Wir tun unser Bestes, um dieses Ziel zu erreichen und haben bereits clevereKonzepte entwickelt, die es nun zu testen gilt.


ZEITPLAN

Zeitplan

  • Februar-März-April = Endgültiges Design und Tests mit Prototypen aus Plastik (3D-Abdrücke)
  • Mai-Juni = Industrielle Produktion der Plastik-Spritzformen
  • Juli-August = Montage und Verpackung
  • September = Vertrieb

VERWENDUNG DER MITTEL

Mittelverteilung

  • 100’000 = Produktion der Spritzformen und damit verbundene Kosten
  • 25’000 = Endgültiges Design und Prototypen
  • 10’000 = Montage und sonstige Produktionskosten
  • 30’000 = Produktion und Verpackung versandbereiter Systeme
  • 5’000 = Unternehmensgründung und sonstige administrative Kosten

Warum wir Ihre Unterstützung brauchen:Wir brauchen Ihre Unterstützung, weil die industrielle Produktion des Systems sehr kostspielig ist, wenn wir den höchsten Qualitätsstandards gerecht werden wollen. Tausende von Menschen sind überzeugt, dass Kid Secure Home eine sinnvolle Lösung ist, mit der die Risiken von Haushaltsunfällen deutlich reduziert werden können. Deshalb gewannen wir mit dem System den Wettbewerb Concours Lépine 2010(Paris, Frankreich) sowie eine Medaille bei der Messe für Erfindungen Salon International de l’Invention (Genf, Schweiz). 2012 wurde das Möbelstück mit den 2 Sicherheitselementen mit grossem Erfolg in der Fernsehsendung L’Inventeur 2012 vorgestellt und aus 650 Beiträgen unter die 9 besten Erfindungen ins Finale gewählt.

PROTOTYPEN

Prototypen: Wir haben gegenwärtig einen Prototyp für daskomplette Möbelstück und einen für das Schubladen-System. Sie sind aus Metall gefertigt. Diese Prototypen dienten als Modelle für die Fotos und Videos, um die praktische Umsetzung des Systems zu veranschaulichen. Unser Ziel ist es, Familien erschwingliche Sicherheitslösungen anzubieten, ohne bei der Qualität Kompromisse eingehen zu müssen. Unsere gegenwärtige Aufgabe besteht darin, das Konzept zu verfeinern, um die Elemente schliesslich aus qualitativ hochwertigem Plastik und so universell wie möglich produzieren zu können. Wir tun unser Bestes, um dieses Ziel zu erreichen und haben bereits clevereKonzepte entwickelt, die es nun zu testen gilt.


ZEITPLAN


Zeitplan



Februar-März-April = Endgültiges Design und Tests mit Prototypen aus Plastik (3D-Abdrücke)


Mai-Juni = Industrielle Produktion der Plastik-Spritzformen


Juli-August = Montage und Verpackung


September = Vertrieb



VERWENDUNG DER MITTEL

Mittelverteilung



100’000 = Produktion der Spritzformen und damit verbundene Kosten


25’000 = Endgültiges Design und Prototypen


10’000 = Montage und sonstige Produktionskosten


30’000 = Produktion und Verpackung versandbereiter Systeme


5’000 = Unternehmensgründung und sonstige administrative Kosten

story:
The Easton Mountain Guest House has been providing safe, warm, and comfortable accommodations to its guests for over 15 years. We all appreciate it's rustic charm, but the time has come to make repairs, upgrades and renovations. Please support this Indiegogo campaign to make this exciting initiative happen.

This transformation will take place before the summer of 2015. Some of the planned changes include painting the exterior, making general upgrades to the interiors, and replacing the bedding. The more we raise the more improvements we will make, so please give generously!

Some of the planned changes include painting the exterior, making general upgrades to the interiors, and replacing the bedding. The more we raise the more improvements we will make, so please give generously!

story:
The Lake Naivasha Disabled Environmental Group (LNDEG) is an organization of volunteer members with disabilities that work to clean and improve the environment around Naivasha. The group is involved in many projects including making and selling briquettes (cooking fuel)  made from paper, cardboard, plant waste, and charcoal dust, rubbish collection, rubbish incineration. These 29 group members work to overcome the stigma of disability and better their communities on top of taking care of their own families. They don't do this because they have to, but they take time in addition to their other jobs and families to support their communities.

I know personally from working with them from my time in Naivsha on some of these projects the care they take for their community. I am no longer in Kenya, but I believe in them so much I decided to help set up this campaign. Because they have sacrificed for others they ask for your contribution to help them continue their work. 

The Need

To be able to devote their time and effort to this group and its efforts the members are looking to several divides to increase their mobility and therefore assist their work: 10 tricycles, 7 wheel chairs, and 3 artificial legs.

$254 buys 1 power-tricycle

$335 buys 1 wheelchair 

$555 buys 1 artificial leg


Your Impact


These devices allow LNDEG to move around more freely and accomplish more with less pain. They will be more independent and able to carry important things with them without worrying about a walking stick. Basically these devices make daily life easier and work faster.  Investing in these helps not only these individuals but their families and the greater community.

With donating of the following perks LNDEG

5 USD  we writte your name on the wall were it will seen by every body.

10 USD you will receive a card and picture of one of the benefits.

12 USD you will receive a card and a bracelet.

20 USD you will receive a card and necklace.

30 USD  you will receive a necklace and a bracelet.

60 USD you will receive a bag and necklace.

100 USD you will receive a card, carved rocks, a bracelet

Challenges

Naivasha is a small Kenyan town, that most people have never heard of.  It's hard to get people to care about strangers they have never met in a small town that cannot name. But I'm asking you to realize the direct and immediate difference you can make in another person's life. 

After a 1.5 years of living in Naivasha, I can say this place has stayed with me. And these people are incredible. Now I'm asking you to be a part what they are doing by helping them be more mobile. Support and share.

story:
"I alone cannot change the world, but i can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples"- Mother Teresa

Go Kidogo!

Hi! We are Sachi, Marleen, Francesco, Jing and Victoria, an extremely international bunch of students from Cass Business School in London just looking to make a difference. Growing up all over the world we all still have the same goal in mind- to Improve access to early childhood care in informal settlements for families that have not had the same opportunities as us. Thats why we are on this journey to support social enterprise Kidogo!

Kidogo is a start up in the informal settlements of Nairobi, Kenya that ultimately designs & operates a network of early childhood development centres that provide young children a safe and stimulating environment, nutritious meals, a play based curriculum and well- trained caregivers from the local community. Local budding 'mama-prenuers' are also given the opportunity to open up their own micro franchised childcare business, by getting assistance with training, materials and the logistics. Which is what WE will be funding.

What exactly is a 'Mama-preneur' you may be thinking? It is very tough to be a child care entrepeneur, you need to have the right skills between being a great mother and a great entrepreneur- hence a 'mama-preneuer!'

By joining us on our delightful journey to fund Kidogo, YOU could be a part of something much bigger than just funding.The financial sustainability and scalability of their model has great potential to be rolled out in informal settlements worldwide. By improving the quality of facilities we hope to transform the trajectory of young children's lives whilst, unlocking their mothers economic potential and empowering 'mama-preneurs' to build strong and thriving businesses. 

Training session on the importance of play for early learning using local materials 


The Kidogo Need


We will be funding the rolling out of the micro-franchise programmes to 'mama-preneurs' in Nairobi who will be given the opportunity to create their own child-care business-in-a-box.


The franchising program will have 2 main tiers:
  • Outreach program for smaller baby care centres- which includes in-center training, light touch mentoring and a rotational "learning-box." This will contain age appropriate lesson plans, activity cards, learning materials and books for the centre
  • Accelerator program for growing education development centres- 'Mama-preneurs' from these centres will be taken through a 6-12 month intensive program where they will be provided with in-depth mentorship and training and the 'Business-in-a-box' which provides access to additional resources.

The costs will be broken down as follows:
  • Training session- Hosting 5-10 'mama-preneurs' for training session (£50-80)
  • 'Learning-box'- developing, sourcing and rotating a learning box (£100)
  • 1 year Mentorship program- for 5-10 centres (£120-240)
  • 'Business-in-a-box'- developing sourcing and providing materials to 'mama-preneurs' (£250)

What does a business-in-a-box contain?



Perks- What you get from us


Because you are giving so much to us, we wanted to give back a little something to you! Here's what you get if you contribute-


The Kidogo Impact

Every contribution you make will go towards funding Kidogo's dream of a world where every child has an opportunity to reach their full potential, regardless of where they were born.

In many urban slums today, enterprising mama's open up their homes to care for children for a small fee, up to $1 USD per day. The quality of these informal baby care centres is often very poor- with 30-40 babies in a small enclosed space, unsafe & unsanitary environment, limited food & clean water and untrained caregivers. In this case, children's health, wellbeing and growth can be compromised leading to developmental delays.


With Kidogo's help local baby cares will provide:

  • A safe environment
  • Caregivers they can trust
  • An affordable and quality curriculum 

The day to day life of a Kidogo kid


Who will benefit?

  • Young Children- between the ages of 0-5, children are most sensitive to their environments. Using Kidogo's model their healthy growth and development can improve the trajectory of the rest of their lives.
  • Mothers- mothers of young children that were faced with the problem of where to leave children when going to work can now leave them in a safe trustworthy space, unlocking their economic potential.
  • 'Mama-preneurs'- local women will have the opportunity to open up their own quality childcare franchise and training to create an economically sustainable business.

We hope that the success of this project could lead to rolling out the model throughout informal settlements in Kenya and all over the world. The creation of small micro franchised day cares will teach 'mama-preneurs' to be self sustainable, whilst fuelling the local economy. Additionally, children will be given the foundation to work towards eradicating the intergenerational cycle of poverty. 

'Mama-preneur' that has developed her own childcare facility

The Kidogo Helping Hand


No donation is too small, every little bit counts!

However if you cannot contribute and still want to be part of our journey in making a difference, kindly share our campaign and spread the word through social media or friends and family, because all great things start small!


For any updates/ information about our campaign follow our blog:

https://kidogo2015campaign.wordpress.com


Thank you for taking the time to read about us and our campaign! GO KIDOGO!

story:
You have a dream! You had your gadget crowd-funded and now want to sell it to retail stores! Where do you start? Who do you trust? Is it really worth my time?


Selling to Retailers is hard!


Unless you have the next Pebble Watch for market (as of this posting, they have raised $14.8 Million and have 23 days left to go), most retail buyers are not going to take a look at your product unless you have a solid plan in distribution and marketing. We want to make selling to retailers easier for small entrepreneurs!

We want to build a platform (aka virtual incubator) where retail-oriented gadget entrepreneurs have a place to learn and develop the necessary strategies in making their dream a reality.

From producing online “how-to” videos where these entrepreneurs can access 24/7 to match-making them with retail and/or distributor opportunities, we want to be the “one-stop” platform for crowd-funded gadget entrepreneurs in reaching retail excellence!

With your help, we really hope we can make a difference for the thousands of product manufacturers, entrepreneurs, and inventors who want to learn how to sell and market effectively to retailers.

A Startling Fact

1 out of every 50 crowd-funded gadget entrepreneurs get their product picked up by  a major retailer.  That's where we want to help. Last year, we interviewed over 500 crowd-funded gadget entrepreneurs and over 90% did not know how to sell to retail buyers, let alone how to contact or reach them.

For the lucky few who were able to get their product picked up by key retailers and distributors, some of them did not see a huge increase in orders due to not knowing what questions to ask in the meetings with retail buyers or what terms and conditions were negotiable prior to signing the retailer's vendor agreement. 



    Why You Should Invest In Us

    Since 2008, we have helped over 2500 small entrepreneurs learn how to sell retailers. Many of them today are still selling in retail stores. One of them made INC Magazine's list of the fastest 500 growing companies two years in a row!


    What makes us different than other companies?

    We have been on both sides of the retail buyer's desk. We have been in the shoes of a small manufacturer selling consumer products to retailers as well as have been large retail buyers managing assortments ranging in the millions. This experience within the retail industry sets us apart as a leading retail marketing and merchandising solutions provider. 

    We feel it's our responsibility to share our secrets in successful selling to retailers with all the small crowd-funded gadget entrepreneurs.  We know that most small entrepreneurs can't afford high quality advice.  With this platform, it will be in reach for all entrepreneurs and puts everyone on the same level playing field.

    And it's up to you - We need your help

    If we want you to get the REAL impact of our retail selling platform, then we must demonstrate and prove that it works - in the real world, with a real project.

    That's why we chose to co-create this retail platform together with you, as an IndieGoGo campaigner.

    When you contribute to this IndieGoGo campaign you become our partner. You get to provide valuable input in how the retail platform should be put together.

    When this IndieGoGo campaign reaches its goal, then we will pick up to five random crowd-funded gadget entrepreneurs and put them through the platform. 

    Final words

    Unique products are the ones that drive customer traffic into a retailer's store:

    • They are the ones that are responsible to most innovation in the world
    • They are the ones that are responsible to most new jobs in the world
    • They are the blood and oxygen of our economy.

    Choose your favorite contribution/reward combination from the right-side column, and let's work together to make the coming year - your best year ever!

    Thank you for making it happen, and thank you for spreading the word.

story:
Today's products of everyday usage have a short-life cycle. We are forced to buy, to consume and to throw away, constantly. We chose quantity over quality.
It is dangerous.
Products have lost their character and charm, because they are made to be thrown away. Products are no part of our memory, no more. Consumed and forgotten.

We lost the relationship with hand-made things, the spiritual connection with the world and with the others. Just like the products around us, we became uniformed, ordinary and replaceable.

This needs to change! We are devoted to offer you a lasting Device. To keep your mind and teeth at ease. Devine.
A Device that is not only part of a style, but part of a common sense. Big changes always start with  *(molo forca).

That is why we transformed an ordinary, everyday Utility into an extraordinary Device that helps us all.

Into a timeless Toothpick that is made out of pure, Czech Silver. Silver is an anti-bacterial, self-cleaning metal. It can be your own symbol of  ...?
Common sense! And an expression of your own personality.

The Challenge:  For Your contribution and by end of this campaign we are prepared to craft various editions and start with further development based on the learnings we made and the input we received from you.

If you dare to be different right away, for Your contribution of only 15 USD we are ready to send you your own, personal Silver surfer prototype (incl. packaging and shipment worldwide). You are one click away from becoming part of a growing and daring community immediately.

We are interested in your follow-ship and fellow-ship above the explicitly stated funding goal. But let it be the dream of: 10000 followers in 6 Weeks.

Depending on You and your support, we are going to develop the Device prototype into a silver-crafted, designed and manufactured editions, or even into a personalized Devices for your venue, which will conquer hearts and markets that will change our everyday mentality.

FAQs in process: *on how to keep it safe and on how to wear it as a fashion accessory. Check out the campaign Gallery here, our facebook page or leave us a comment on your thoughts here at Indiegogo.

In other Ways that You Can Help:

We decided to donate 10% of all raised funds to a program of our choice dedicated to the Conservation of the Adriatic Sea.

story:
Leider ist unsere Kampagne zu Ende. Die Beträge, welche Ihr uns habt zukommen lassen, werden auf unserem PayPal-Konto gelagert, bis wir unseren nächsten praktischen Schritt gehen. Vielen Dank noch einmal für Euer Vertrauen!

Falls Ihr weitere Fragen habt oder Euch informieren wollt, wie es weiter geht, könnt Ihr uns connecten:
petilu@t-online.de

Herzliche Grüße,

Ulli und Patricia

story:
Why I am Impassioned

For the past several years I had been on a crazy search to find my calling. So last summer I traveled to Bali to attend a Breath Work retreat. Not knowing too much about the experience I would have, I was attracted because I was having difficulty coming to terms with some unfortunate events that had happened in my life. I had spent the majority of my life avoiding any "negative" feelings and I wouldn't crawl out of my comfort zone if my life depended on it. I felt like like emotion was stuck in my body and literally making me sick (diagnosed with fibromyalgia in 2004). Within the first two hours of the breath work retreat I had a KNOWING that I had landed in exactly the right place. We did two breath work sessions a day for 5 days and with each session I did, I was gaining more and more clarity about what I was on this planet to do, the next steps to take and how to achieve that.  When I got back to California I was so ON. I think it was the first time I ever felt really  lit up about my mission. And now it's time to return to Bali so I can take the level 2 training and complete my certification. My vision is to create a Breath Work Community here on the Central Coast, a community of people meeting on a regular basis to connect, heal, be seen and loved for who they are on the inside. It's going to be so amazing!


What I Need & What You Get

     Breath of Bliss Training  $2,300

     Flight to Bali                        $1,000

I am offering breath work sessions, private yoga instruction and coaching packages for a very reduced rate.


The Impact

I believe that when people have clarity in their lives it frees them up to give back. I am certain that the ripple out effects of people living in alignment with their dreams will not only benefit this community but touch many others. I feel I can help to facilitate people doing just that.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to help but just can't afford to at this time. I would really encourage you to help by getting the word out. You can always use the indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Why I am Impassioned
For the past several years I had been on a crazy search to find my calling. So last summer I traveled to Bali to attend a Breath Work retreat. Not knowing too much about the experience I would have, I was attracted because I was having difficulty coming to terms with some unfortunate events that had happened in my life. I had spent the majority of my life avoiding any "negative" feelings and I wouldn't crawl out of my comfort zone if my life depended on it. I felt like like emotion was stuck in my body and literally making me sick (diagnosed with fibromyalgia in 2004). Within the first two hours of the breath work retreat I had a KNOWING that I had landed in exactly the right place. We did two breath work sessions a day for 5 days and with each session I did, I was gaining more and more clarity about what I was on this planet to do, the next steps to take and how to achieve that.  When I got back to California I was so ON. I think it was the first time I ever felt really  lit up about my mission. And now it's time to return to Bali so I can take the level 2 training and complete my certification. It's going to be so amazing!

story:
Pyramid Productions is creating a beer to promote the film "AMERICAN GUYS"! 

We are a small production company based in Portland,   Oregon.... the land of the beer and film entrepreneurs. So why not merge the two!  We aim to bring authentic hand crafted brewing recipes handed down from generations of Oregon micro brewers! 
  • This campaign will launch a tasty beer and promote new and entertaining films.
  • Contributors will play a pivotal role in launching American Guys Beer. 
  • We have a passion for new ideas and creativity.    

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need about two hundred and fifty thousand dollars to make this happen.   The money will be going to craft authentic hand crafted micro brews. 
  • The packaging label on the beer will include an access code where the purchaser will be able to download the movie "American Guys " and eventually other films and music!   

The Impact

  • Our project is a worthy one.  It is simple. The world needs more comedy and more beer.  
  • Other Ways You Can Help
  • Please help us get the word out there about our campaign.
  • Share us with the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

The U.S. Green Building Council of West Virginia and the American Society of Interior Design Students at the University of Charleston are teaming up this year to compete in the 9th Annual canstruction West Virginia competition.

The canned food design/build competition will be held during the West Virginia Home Show at the Charleston Civic Center on Saturday, April 11, 2015.  All canned food from the competition will go to stock the food pantry at the Covenant House in Charleston, WV.   

Our design concept illustrates the role that clean water plays in sustaining a healthy life and that we all live downstream. 

What We Need & What You Get

With a budget of $5,000 for materials and supplies, we will be purchasing and donating a total of 5,450 cans of food.

You can donate any amount.  If you choose a certain donation amount, your name will be listed on the display board next to the sculpture during and after the competition. 

The Impact

This is our team's third year participating in canstruction West Virginia.  The much-needed canned food will go to the Charleston, WV Covenant House where it will stock the food pantry for the next year. 
 

Risks & Challenges

This is our largest and most challenging project to date.  It will require donations from you and countless volunteer hours from our team.
